choose.when: FID, FGRID_CODE, FCOLUMN_CODE, FCOLUMN_NAME, FPROPERTY, FIS_LIST, FIS_SHOW, FIS_FORM, FIS_EDIT, FWIDTH, FCOLSPAN, FROWSPAN, FLEVEL, FALIGN, FQUERY_STATE, FQUERY_TYPE, FDICT_TYPE, FFORMAT, FREQUIRED, FMIN_LENGTH, FMAX_LENGTH, FMIN_VALUE, FMAX_VALUE, FVALIDATE_TYPE, FWIDGET_ID, FIS_PK, FIS_NULL, FIS_INSERT, FJAVA_TYPE, FJDBC_TYPE, FORDER, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_grid_info
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_grid_info where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_grid_info (FID, FGRID_CODE, FCOLUMN_CODE, FCOLUMN_NAME, FPROPERTY, FIS_LIST, FIS_SHOW, FIS_FORM, FIS_EDIT, FWIDTH, FCOLSPAN, FROWSPAN, FLEVEL, FALIGN, FQUERY_STATE, FQUERY_TYPE, FDICT_TYPE, FFORMAT, FREQUIRED, FMIN_LENGTH, FMAX_LENGTH, FMIN_VALUE, FMAX_VALUE, FVALIDATE_TYPE, FWIDGET_ID, FIS_PK, FIS_NULL, FIS_INSERT, FJAVA_TYPE, FJDBC_TYPE, FORDER, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gridCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isList, jdbcType=BIT}, #{isShow, jdbcType=BIT}, #{isForm, jdbcType=BIT}, #{isEdit, jdbcType=BIT}, #{width, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colspan, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rowspan, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{align, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryState, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{queryType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{format, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{required, jdbcType=BIT}, #{minLength, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxLength, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validateType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{widgetId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPk, jdbcType=BIT}, #{isNull, jdbcType=BIT}, #{isInsert, jdbcType=BIT}, #{javaType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdbcType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
